summary: With over 5 years of development experience, M Arslan approaches challenges with a professional attitude, dedication, and a focus on providing optimal long-term solutions. Specializing in various forms of automation including Web, Mobile, and API, and proficient in tools like Playwright, Cypress, and Selenium.

In my role as an SQA Automation Engineer, I not only automate test cases, but
also strive to deliver software solutions of the highest quality. I take an active
part in team interactions and client communications, while also taking charge
of implementing client-specified features through Jira tickets.
My experience working within Agile teams has honed my skills in both Scrum
and Kanban methodologies. I adapt these methodologies according to the
current stage of the project, ensuring optimal efficiency and productivity.
This seamless integration into the development cycle allows me to aid in the
delivery of software solutions that consistently exceed client expectations.
My professional approach is underpinned by a commitment to continuous
improvement, effective communication, and adherence to Agile practices. This
dedication propels the success of every project I undertake. If your team would
benefit from the addition of a passionate, collaborative, and results-oriented

SQA Automation Engineer, I would welcome the opportunity to discuss how I
can contribute to your team's success.
